mapper.select: SELECT s.seq AS 'seq', b.seq AS 'building_seq', b.nm AS 'building_name', s.sex AS 'sex', s.floor AS 'floor', s.nick_nm AS 'nick_nm', sr.seq AS 'secret_room_seq', sr.nick_nm AS 'secret_room_nick_nm', sr.modify_ymdt AS 'secret_room_modify_ymdt', sr.stat AS 'secret_room_stat', ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM section_knock k WHERE k.section_seq = s.seq AND k.reg_ymdt > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -15 MINUTE) ) AS 'current_knock_count' FROM section s INNER JOIN building b ON s.building_seq = b.seq LEFT OUTER JOIN secret_room sr ON s.seq = sr.section_seq WHERE s.seq = #{sectionSequence}
SELECT seq as sequence, building_seq as buildingSequence, floor, sex, nick_nm as nickName FROM section
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO section (building_seq, floor, sex, nick_nm) VALUE (#{buildingSequence}, #{floor}, #{sex}, #{nickName})
mapper.update: UPDATE section SET building_seq = #{buildingSequence}, floor = #{floor}, sex = #{sex}, nick_nm = #{nickName} where seq = #{sequence}
